Text: Do you happen to have the new Green Hornet: Leagacy issues (#34 and #35)?

Natilie, no i don't. someone else asked about them a few days ago, and IIRC they have been released but apparently haven't been scanned. still keeping an eye out for them.

GP67, you're welcome!

Thanks man. Love the style used here, how the motion makes things like conversations works. Great addition, looking forward to seeing where this goes.

I keep waiting for your pink skull to change. Should have gotten the VIP by now, all things considered.

BabiesDontNeedSpleens, oh yeah, it's cool.

i don't know if they were the first, but the avengers vs. x-men crossover had a digital chapter (featuring nova) that used this way of presenting a comic. very dynamic! i prefer it.

you could also check out the recent "guardians of the galaxy infinite" -- same technique.
